comments.creator: jmuizelaar@mozilla.com
comments.text: When this happens Firefox will complain that it's already running which will keep users from running it. It would be good if we had a watchdog that would cause us to try really hard to kill ourselves. We could also try to get some telemetry on how often this happens.
